properties.Scheme: Udamailapitiya North Stream near Suramya stores
properties.Problem to be addressed /Recommendations:
Water leaks through masonry retaining wall. Recommend to 
1. Provide 100mm thick 300mm high concrete curtain wall with base for 25m long section.
2. Fill cavities and re-plaster for 300mm high 15m length.
3. Dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Areca nut trees Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/Aththikka/ Wal del/ Kekuna randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid interval about 100 Sq.m

properties.Scheme: Udamailapitiya North- Well and Spring near Pragathi Plant Nursery
properties.Problem to be addressed /Recommendations: Part of the retaining wall, about 50m long portion, is nearly collapsing. Recommend Constructing 150mm thick x750mm high x50m long RCC retaining wall with 600mm base.
